<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update Snippet Configuration</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/dlp/api/v1/dss-api/snippets"}></MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Updates the snippet masking configuration for your tenant.

## Request
